title: Enlarge game images and trigger video on click

requirements.text: Increase the size of game images in GameCard component to make them more prominent in the display

quotes: make game image to appear bigger

acceptanceCriteria: Game images are visibly larger than current size
Images remain properly proportioned and do not overflow their containers
Layout adjusts appropriately to accommodate larger images

requirements.text: Change video trailer behavior in GameCard so that the video only plays when user clicks on the game image, not automatically

quotes: once we click on game image then the video trailer starts not before

acceptanceCriteria: Video trailer does not autoplay when GameCard is rendered
Clicking on the game image triggers the video trailer to start playing
Video player controls remain accessible after click-to-play is initiated

constraints: Do not change backend logic or data structures
Preserve existing Buy Now and admin action buttons functionality
nonGoals: Changing the overall layout structure of GameCatalog
Modifying video source URLs or trailer data
Adding new video player features beyond click-to-play
